item.elementalamulets.guide_book.subtitl: Contains all knowledge about Elemental Amulets
item.elementalamulets.water_element.tool: Elegant, clear but can be chaotic too
item.elementalamulets.earth_element.tool: Strong, powerful and filled with life
item.elementalamulets.aether_element.too: The legendary fifth element! Well at least something
item.elementalamulets.air_amulet.tooltip: Control air! Hold SHIFT to stop!
item.elementalamulets.earth_amulet.toolt: Farming and other green activities will be boosted
item.elementalamulets.wip_50: This item is currently a little bit buggy! Sorry for that :/
item.elementalamulets.wip: This item is currently not working! Sorry for that :/
block.elementalamulets.celestial_focus.t: The heavens themselves will increase the speed of elemental combination
jei.elementalamulets.amulets.description:
Amulets - are magical jewels(in our case necklaces) that grant you a variety of powers.
 More about them you can read in Elemental Guide
jei.elementalamulets.guide_book.descript: A book with all information about this mod, to access it you need Patchouli!
jei.elementalamulets.elemental_combinato:
Allows you to combine things and get unique and powerful items!
 More about it you can read in Elemental Guide
jei.elementalamulets.elements.descriptio: Elements are the five main powers in Minecraft's world!
jei.elementalamulets.convertibles.descri: When 6 of these are combined with empty element(Elemental Shards) they produce %s
jei.elementalamulets.aether_element.desc: Small amount of aether magnetized to a shard. Used in upgrade combinations
jei.elementalamulets.all_seeing_lens.des:
A very rare item, only one person knows how to do it.
 Jeweller sells it on level 4
patchouli.elementalamulets.landing: Hello $(thing)$(playername)!$() This $(l)magical guide $() will provide you with all knowledge you need! $(br)Book will expand itself when a new knowledge is acquired! Everything(almost) about this mod is described here!
patchouli.elementalamulets.not_present: Patchouli is not detected! Please install patchouli in order to get access to this book
patchouli.elementalamulets.no_ide: You want to open it, but the magical lock on it prevents you from doing that! Book is sealed and may not be opened! (Book is work in progress)
advancements.elementalamulets.desc: Things that you will achieve in your adventure
advancements.elementalamulets.combine.de: Use Elemental Combinator for the first time!
advancements.elementalamulets.combine_ae: Combine the legendary fifth element, aether...
advancements.elementalamulets.amulet_max: Upgrade amulet to the highest tier
advancements.elementalamulets.wear_all_a: Wear all amulets at least once
death.attack.elementalamulets.leaf_cut: %s was cut to death by leaf shield!
commands.elementalamulets.give.failure: Error! %s is not an elemental amulet!
config.elementalamulets.elements_latin_v: If true, elements names will be in latin (Ignis, Aer, Aqua and Terra) [DEFAULT: false]
config.elementalamulets.elemental_combin: Display output slot on Elemental Combinator? [DEFAULT: true]
Display output slot on Elemental Combinator? [DEFAULT: true]
config.elementalamulets.amulets_tier_dif: Set to true, if you want amulets to be different based on their tier [DEFAULT: false]
